item.title: DM 称壳牌确认有意退出南非业务
item.description: 据《特立独行日报》报道，壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）打算退出其在南非的零售、运输和炼油业务股权。【原文：Shell Plc intends to exit shareholdings in its South African retail, transport and refining operations, Daily Maverick reported.】

item.title: 达斯表示，印度中央银行将提供离线数字货币
item.description: 印度储备银行行长沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度储备银行正在努力使其数字货币无需依赖互联网接入即可使用。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India is working to make its digital currency available without being dependent on internet access, according to Governor Shaktikanta Das.】

item.title: 欧洲央行辛库斯预计今年将降息三次
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，他认为借贷成本将在2024年降低三次，并将从6月份的计划开始。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said he sees borrowing costs being reduced three times in 2024 — starting with the planned move in June.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预算获得的石油收入是一年前的两倍
item.description: 尽管国际制裁旨在限制资金流向，以助长弗拉基米尔-普京总统的乌克兰战争，但俄罗斯 4 月份的石油收入仍比去年同期翻了一番多。【原文：Russia’s oil revenue more than doubled in April from a year earlier, despite international sanctions intended to limit the flow of money to fuel President Vladimir Putin’s war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金在潜在降息前看涨消费股
item.description: 随着最新经济数据和美联储言论重燃降息押注，对冲基金正在扭转对消费类股票的看跌立场。【原文：Hedge funds are reversing their bearish stance on consumer stocks as the latest economic data and comments from the Federal Reserve revive bets on interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 加拿大年轻人感觉更穷，这是对经济和特鲁多的警示信号
item.description: 加拿大人对个人财务状况感到悲观，而 Z 世代是最悲观的一代。【原文：Canadians are feeling gloomy about their personal finances — and Generation Z is the gloomiest of all.】

item.title: 深圳放宽购房限制，重振中国科技中心的销售业绩
item.description: 中国的科技中心深圳与其他大城市一道放宽了购房规定，以重振陷入困境的房地产市场。【原文：China’s technology hub of Shenzhen has joined other major cities in easing home buying rules as authorities try to revive the beleaguered real estate market.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行招聘私人银行家，瞄准迈阿密和墨西哥的富裕客户
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）今年迄今已招聘了 40 名私人银行家，以满足欧洲和拉丁美洲高净值客户和超富裕客户的需求，从而增加其管理的资产。【原文：Banco Santander SA has hired 40 private bankers so far this year to cater to high—net-worth and ultra wealthy clients in Europe and Latin America as it aims to increase assets under management.】

item.title: 欧洲称已准备好使用所有贸易工具抵御中国
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）警告说，如果中国不能提供公平的市场准入，欧洲准备好使用一切可用的工具来捍卫其经济。【原文：Europe is ready to use all the tools available to defend its economies if China fails to offer fair access to its markets, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen warned.】

item.title: 季度利润超预期，泰森上调业绩展望
item.description: 在美国肉类行业回暖的背景下，泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. raised its 2024 earnings outlook after posting second-quarter profits that beat analyst estimates amid a rebound in the US meat industry.】

item.title: 纳格尔说：央行需要数字货币来保持相关性
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，过去几年的技术创新为央行的未来打上了一个问号，官员们必须 "加快 "包括数字货币在内的适应性调整。【原文：The technological innovation of the past years puts a question mark over central banks’ future and officials must “speed up” adaptation including digital currencies, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: GIP 和 CPPIB 将以 39 亿美元收购美国公用事业所有者 Allete
item.description: Global Infrastructure Partners 和加拿大养老金计划投资委员会同意以约 39 亿美元的价格收购位于明尼苏达州的公用事业所有者 Allete Inc.【原文：Global Infrastructure Partners and Canada Pension Plan Investment Board agreed to acquire Allete Inc., a Minnesota-based utility owner, for about $3.9 billion.】

item.title: 印度取消豆类进口税，在大选期间为价格降温
item.description: 印度是世界上最大的豆类消费国，在全国大选如火如荼进行之际，印度取消了部分豆类品种的进口关税，以抑制粮食通胀。【原文：India, the world’s biggest consumer of pulses, removed import duties on some varieties in a fresh bid to curb food inflation with national elections in full swing.】

item.description: 早上好。股票期货走高、债券和股票面临的挑战以及巴菲特对苹果公司的喜爱。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures edge higher, the challenges facing bonds and stocks and Warren Buffett’s love for Apple. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 医疗地产交易后，Steward Health 申请破产保护
item.description: Steward Health Care System LLC 周一早些时候申请破产，因为它正在与房东 Medical Properties Trust Inc.【原文：Steward Health Care System LLC filed for bankruptcy early Monday as it’s finalizing a rescue loan with landlord Medical Properties Trust Inc.】

item.title: 新兴市场三巨头因政策转向获得信用评级提升
item.description: 土耳其的主权评级被上调，埃及和尼日利亚的评级展望也被上调，这三大新兴经济体的市场受到提振。【原文：Markets in three of the largest emerging economies got a boost after Turkey’s sovereign rating was upgraded, and as the outlooks for both Egypt and Nigeria were lifted.】

item.title: 房东 SBB 拨款支付六月延迟的股息
item.description: 瑞典房东 SBB 在推迟支付股息以保护资产负债表一年后，已留出资金，使其能够在下个月支付尚未支付的股息。【原文：Swedish landlord SBB has put aside funds to enable it to pay outstanding dividends next month, a year after they postponed payouts to protect the balance sheet.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 指数跌至上市以来最低水平
item.description: 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 货币兑美元汇率已跌至一个月前推出以来的最低水平。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed ZiG currency has weakened to its lowest level against the US dollar since it was launched a month ago.】

item.title: 贝恩资本将康苏利混凝土预制件公司移交给债权人
item.description: 作为削减该建材公司 3 亿欧元净债务努力的一部分，债权人将接管贝恩资本（Bain Capital）拥有的 Consolis 公司。【原文：Creditors are set to take over Consolis, owned by Bain Capital, as part of an effort to slash €300 million in the building materials company’s net debt.】

item.title: 中国节俭旅游者显示消费者信心依然疲软
item.description: 在刚刚过去的五天劳动节假期中，中国游客大量上路，但他们的钱包却一直紧紧地捂着，这反映出世界第二大经济体仍然疲软的情绪。【原文：Chinese tourists hit the road in greater numbers during a recent five-day Labor Day holiday but kept a tight grip on their wallets, reflecting still-weak sentiment in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 马士基认为红海冲突将吸收多达 20% 的船舶运力
item.description: A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S预计，本季度航运业将把 15%至 20%的亚洲至欧洲船只运力用于驶往非洲南部，以避开红海。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S expects that the shipping industry this quarter will spend 15% to 20% of its Asia-to-Europe vessel capacity on sailing south of Africa to avoid the Red Sea.】

item.description: 日元跌幅扩大，平抑了上周五的大幅反弹，原因是交易商将注意力重新转移到日本的利率前景上。【原文：The yen extended losses, unwinding its sharp rebound on Friday, as traders shifted their focus back to Japan’s interest-rate outlook.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师认为通胀是股市走向的关键
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师表示，下周的美国通胀数据将成为股市走势和美联储降息赌注的关键。【原文：Next week’s US inflation print looms as key for the trajectory of equities and wagers on Federal Reserve interest rate cuts, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 塔斯社称俄罗斯将举行战术核武器演习
item.description: 据塔斯社周一报道，俄军已开始准备在该国南部地区举行导弹部队和航空兵演习，以演练战术核武器的使用。【原文：The Russian army has started preparations for exercises of its missile forces and aviation in the southern part of the country to practice the use of tactical nuclear weapons, Tass reported on Monday.】
